title: SchemaGPT for app structure planning [GPT-4]
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "METHOD": [
            "GET",
            "POST",
            "PUT",
            "DELETE"
        ],
        "PATH": [
            "/messages",
            "/messages/{id}",
            "/users/{userId}/messages"
        ],
        "IS AUTH REQUIRED": [
            "true",
            "false"
        ],
        "UNIQUE HEADERS": [
            "Content-Type: application/json",
            "Authorization: Bearer {token}",
            "X-Custom-Header: {value}"
        ],
        "BODY IF METHOD SUPPORTS": [
            "{ \"content\": \"message content\" }",
            "{ \"recipientId\": \"userId\", \"content\": \"message content\" }"
        ],
        "DESCRIPTION": [
            "Endpoint to retrieve all messages",
            "Endpoint to send a new message",
            "Endpoint to update an existing message",
            "Endpoint to delete a message"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1_ans:
Here’s the schema for the messaging app based on your input:

```
POST /messages
Auth: Yes
Headers: Content-Type: application/json, Authorization: Bearer {token}
Body: { "senderId": "string", "receiverId": "string", "message": "string" }
Description: Endpoint to send a message from one user to another in the messaging app.
```

If you need additional endpoints or modifications, feel free to ask!

Based on the provided information, here is the structured representation of the API endpoint:

```json
{
    "METHOD": "POST",
    "PATH": "/messages",
    "IS AUTH REQUIRED": "true",
    "UNIQUE HEADERS": [
        "Content-Type: application/json",
        "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
    ],
    "BODY IF METHOD SUPPORTS": "{ \"senderId\": \"string\", \"receiverId\": \"string\", \"message\": \"string\" }",
    "DESCRIPTION": "Endpoint to send a message from one user to another in the messaging app."
}
``` 

This format captures all the relevant details about the API endpoint for sending a message.
input2_ans:
```
GET /messages/{userId}
Auth: Yes
Headers: Authorization: Bearer {token}
Body: N/A
Description: Endpoint to retrieve all messages for a specific user, identified by userId, in the messaging app.
```

```
POST /messages
Auth: Yes
Headers: Authorization: Bearer {token}, Content-Type: application/json
Body: {
    "recipientId": "{recipientId}",
    "message": "{messageContent}"
}
Description: Endpoint to send a new message to a specific user, identified by recipientId, with the content provided in messageContent.
```

```
GET /messages/{userId}/{messageId}
Auth: Yes
Headers: Authorization: Bearer {token}
Body: N/A
Description: Endpoint to retrieve a specific message for a user, identified by userId and messageId, in the messaging app.
```

```
DELETE /messages/{userId}/{messageId}
Auth: Yes
Headers: Authorization: Bearer {token}
Body: N/A
Description: Endpoint to delete a specific message for a user, identified by userId and messageId, in the messaging app.
```

```
PUT /messages/{userId}/{messageId}
Auth: Yes
Headers: Authorization: Bearer {token}, Content-Type: application/json
Body: {
    "message": "{updatedMessageContent}"
}
Description: Endpoint to update a specific message for a user, identified by userId and messageId, with the new content provided in updatedMessageContent.
```

```
GET /messages/{userId}/unread
Auth: Yes
Headers: Authorization: Bearer {token}
Body: N/A
Description: Endpoint to retrieve all unread messages for a specific user, identified by userId, in the messaging app.
```

Based on the provided information, here is the structured representation of the API endpoint:

```json
{
    "METHOD": "GET",
    "PATH": "/messages/{userId}",
    "IS AUTH REQUIRED": "true",
    "UNIQUE HEADERS": [
        "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
    ],
    "BODY IF METHOD SUPPORTS": "N/A",
    "DESCRIPTION": "Endpoint to retrieve all messages for a specific user, identified by userId, in the messaging app."
}
```
